channel.title: CVE Feed for theDotstore -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for theDotstore -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39159|2023-10-03T12:39:47.588Z -- thedotstore -- fraud%20prevention%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in theDotstore Fraud Prevention For Woocommerce plugin <= 2.1.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-39158|2023-10-03T13:20:37.333Z -- thedotstore -- banner%20management%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in theDotstore Banner Management For WooCommerce plugin <= 2.4.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40212|2023-10-03T12:36:44.732Z -- thedotstore -- product%20attachment%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in theDotstore Product Attachment for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.1.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40561|2023-10-04T13:55:25.415Z -- thedotstore -- enhanced%20ecommerce%20google%20analytics%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in theDotstore Enhanced Ecommerce Google Analytics for WooCommerce plugin <= 3.7.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40559|2023-10-04T14:11:08.528Z -- thedotstore -- dynamic%20pricing%20and%20discount%20rules%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in theDotstore Dynamic Pricing and Discount Rules for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.4.0 versions.
